overview:
Harold Schmoecker is focused on growing Unitrends’ sales efforts, partner relationships and field marketing efforts for the company’s Western Region, including states from Ohio to Louisiana and all points west. He brings to Unitrends 20 years of technology sales and management experience.

Prior to joining Unitrends, Schmoecker spent four years at Toshiba American Information Systems, where he was part of a team chartered to develop and market a solution-based appliance business. He was responsible for major account sales, solution sales and business development for Toshiba’s hardware appliance business. Earlier, he served as a territory manager for two years with Micron Electronics. Schmoecker has a long and successful track record working within the Value-Added Reseller channel throughout the United States, including responsibilities for individual sales, sales management, and branch management.
